job_description: I smash others with a chair.

yes: Death to the undead, School hall monitor.
Fortune smile upon you, School hall monitor.

responses.text: Anything I can do for you?

dynamic_line: A school this is, turned to a fortress from this whole damnation.

responses.text: So the world is screwed, and this is some kinda bunker, yeah?

dynamic_line: It is. Although for some reason the front gate is also blocked with stone, and it is too thick for us to remove or dig a tunnel through it.  So, I sent our team, there is some kinda underground tunnel(subway) nearby.

responses.text: Oh, okay.  Talk to you later!

dynamic_line: I do not, unfortunately.  If you want to, then go ask one of the actual traders.  Me and my men are just protecting other survivors.

responses.text: I'll go talk to them later.

dynamic_line: They are the actual guardsman type of guys for school. Well, they were, before the whole world doomed.  Unlike them, we are the 'special forces' type - better gear, better weapons - but still in a bad condition, just like them.

responses.text: Okay, I'll go look for him then. Thanks!

dynamic_line: Stay safe out there.  Hate to have to kill you after you've already died.

description: Clear out the subway, and try not do die while doing so.

dialogue.offer: If you want to lend a hand we could use your help the problem on the 'subway' part of the school.  A group of military cosplayers turned crazy and well, started blasting.  They got their hands on a gun... or some kinda ranged weapon somehow, so please put them down ASAP.
dialogue.accepted: Please be careful, we don't need any more deaths.
dialogue.rejected: Come back when you get a chance, we really need to clear the place.
dialogue.advice: If you can, get a friend or two to help you.
dialogue.inquire: Will they be bothering us any longer?
dialogue.success: Thank you, having that big of a threat close to home was nerve wracking.  Here's some of our local certified coins, we've been paying these to our friends in exchange for supplies.  They're getting some value in the school as a trade item, I'm afraid they're all we have to spare at the moment.
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: It was a lost cause anyways…

name: Find Belts for Armor
description: Obtain 3 firefighter/police duty belts, or 6 webbing/leather belts in exchange for some items.

dialogue.offer: Some of our people's armor received damage after <the_cataclysm> and we were waiting on replacement parts.  Now the school is on full lockdown and we need some materials.  Three police duty or firefighter belts will do.
dialogue.advice: If you can't find actual firefighter/police duty belts, jest bring six webbing belts or six normal leather belts.  Nothing difficult.
dialogue.accepted: I'll be here when you get back.  Good luck!
dialogue.success: Oh, cool, give 'em here. Thank you, <name_g>, we'll be fine for a long while from now.  Although we do need other materials.
dialogue.success_lie: Where are they?  I don't believe you.
dialogue.failure: That's unfortunate.  I guess we'll have to find someone else to do it.

description: Clear out the paintball park, and try not do die while doing so.

dialogue.offer: If you want to lend a hand we could use your help the problem on the paintball park.  A dude got a weird anime power or something and started to bash things like crazy.  That anime power do not have a ranged attack yet, but it is still powerful somehow, so please put him down ASAP.
dialogue.accepted: Please be careful, we don't need any more deaths.
dialogue.rejected: Come back when you get a chance, we really need to clear the place.
dialogue.advice: If you can, get a friend or two to help you.
dialogue.inquire: Will they be bothering us any longer?
dialogue.success: Thank you, having that big of a threat close to home was nerve wracking.  Here's some of our local certified coins, we've been paying these to our friends in exchange for supplies.  They're getting some value in the school as a trade item, I'm afraid they're all we have to spare at the moment.
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: It was a lost cause anyways…

description: Clear out the roof of the school dorms, and try not do die while doing so.

dialogue.offer: If you want to lend a hand we could use your help the problem on the top of the school dorms.  The dude that you killed?  He is back, and still powerful somehow, so please put him down ASAP.
dialogue.accepted: Please be careful, we don't need any more deaths.
dialogue.rejected: Come back when you get a chance, we really need to clear the place.
dialogue.advice: If you can, get a friend or two to help you.
dialogue.inquire: Will they be bothering us any longer?
dialogue.success: I can't believe it!  You don't even need me here.  Great job!
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: It was a lost cause anyways…

description: Clear out the golf course, and try not do die while doing so.

dialogue.offer: That trasfer student... Dong-seok Jeong, was he?  Anyway he is back, tough as that guy from a game where one got burned and then dropped at a canyon.  You know the drill; kill him... if it is possible.  This time it is the golf course.
dialogue.accepted: Please be careful, we don't need any more deaths.
dialogue.rejected: Come back when you get a chance, we really need to clear the place.
dialogue.advice: If you can, get a friend or two to help you.
dialogue.success: Damn, I dunno what happened to him, but dude reminds me of that weird security guy from the 'home of the undead' series.  I really wish he does not come back anymore.  Anyway, Thank you, <name_g>.  He can come back, so be prepared for him.
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: It was a lost cause anyways…

description: Clear out in front of the school, and try not do die while doing so.

dialogue.offer: That <name_b>, not dead at all, give him all you got!
dialogue.accepted: Please be careful, we don't need any more deaths.
dialogue.rejected: Come back when you get a chance, we really need to clear the place.
dialogue.advice: If you can, get a friend or two to help you.
dialogue.success: Only man himself can control its fate - he wasn't a man anymore.  I don't feel too well, but at least he is finally dead.
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: It was a lost cause anyways…

description: If you don't find <color_light_blue>antibiotics</color> for this person within the time limit, they will <color_red>most likely die</color>.

dialogue.offer: From the last battle, I'm infected due to a scratch.  Badly.  I need you to get some antibiotics for me. I cannot move right now - the wound is quite deep.
dialogue.accepted: Oh, thank god, thank you so much!  I won't last more than a couple of hours, so hurry…
dialogue.advice: Check school's glass shelves; you could find them.
dialogue.success: Oh thank god!  I'll be right as rain in no time.
dialogue.success_lie: What?!  You're lying, I can tell!  Ugh, forget it!
dialogue.failure: How am I not dead already?!

name.str: It's Not All About The Money

dialogue.offer: Give me three hundred high school coins, and I will give you something awesome.
dialogue.advice: Try searching lockers and stuff, if you cannot - well, what a pity.
dialogue.success: I appreciate it, here's your reward: With this holy blade and sacred duty, may you serve with honor and justice in the name of our divine purpose.
dialogue.failure: Well I'll have to scavenge the gold myself, thanks for nothing.

description: Clear out the front of school, and try not do die while doing so.

dialogue.offer: If you want to lend a hand we could use your help the problem on the main gate of the school.  A group of survivors died due to some group of zombies.  They will be a pain in our butt in the long run, so please eliminate them ASAP.
dialogue.accepted: Please be careful, we don't need any more deaths.
dialogue.rejected: Come back when you get a chance, we really need to start reclaiming the region.
dialogue.advice: If you can, get a friend or two to help you.
dialogue.inquire: Will they be bothering us any longer?
dialogue.success: Thank you, having that big of a threat close to home was nerve wracking.  Here's some of our local certified coins, we've been paying these to our friends in exchange for supplies.  They're getting some value in the school as a trade item, I'm afraid they're all we have to spare at the moment.
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: It was a lost cause anyways…
